items.name: SC-37 Legionnaire
items.description: This armor is based on the antique uniforms of the 'Super Earth Legion', a less patriotic precursor to the Helldivers.

passive.name: Servo-Assisted
passive.description:
Increases throwing range by 30%. 
 Provides +50% limb health.

items.name: SC-15 Drone Master
items.description: Some soldiers report picking up strange radio interference when wearing this armor near alien artifacts.

passive.name: Engineering Kit
passive.description:
Further Reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. 
 Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of grenades by +2.
